CHAPTER I  Paragraph Examples
CHAPTER II  Examples2 Paragraph
CHAPTER III  Paragraph Examples3



CHAPTER I  Paragraph Examples

You must begin a new paragraph each time a different character begins to speak. Paragraphs are your friend for dialogue between two or more people. For example:
"I don't want to go home," said Julia. "I like it here at the zoo. The animals are all so funny." She began to cry and then wailed, "I didn't even get to see the elephants!"
"Your friend,

"DRACULA."

CHAPTER II  Examples2 Paragraph

I did so, and saw a large ￢ﾀﾜE￢ﾀﾝ with a small ￢ﾀﾜg,￢ﾀﾝ a ￢ﾀﾜP,￢ﾀﾝ and a large ￢ﾀﾜG￢ﾀﾝ
with a small ￢ﾀﾜt￢ﾀﾝ woven into the texture of the paper.
￢ﾀﾜWhat do you make of that?￢ﾀﾝ asked Holmes.
￢ﾀﾜThe name of the maker, no doubt; or his monogram, rather.￢ﾀﾝ

CHAPTER III  Paragraph Examples3

￢ﾀﾜThe paper was made in Bohemia,￢ﾀﾝ I said.

*** END OF THIS PROJECT GUTENBERG EBOOK THE ADVENTURES OF SHERLOCK HOLMES ***

CHAPTER II  Examples2 Paragraph
CHAPTER III  Paragraph Examples3



CHAPTER I  Paragraph Examples

You must begin a new paragraph each time a different character begins to speak. Paragraphs are your friend for dialogue between two or more people. For example:
"I don't want to go home," said Julia. "I like it here at the zoo. The animals are all so funny." She began to cry and then wailed, "I didn't even get to see the elephants!"
"Your friend,

"DRACULA."

CHAPTER II  Examples2 Paragraph

I did so, and saw a large ￢ﾀﾜE￢ﾀﾝ with a small ￢ﾀﾜg,￢ﾀﾝ a ￢ﾀﾜP,￢ﾀﾝ and a large ￢ﾀﾜG￢ﾀﾝ
with a small ￢ﾀﾜt￢ﾀﾝ woven into the texture of the paper.
￢ﾀﾜWhat do you make of that?￢ﾀﾝ asked Holmes.
￢ﾀﾜThe name of the maker, no doubt; or his monogram, rather.￢ﾀﾝ

CHAPTER III  Paragraph Examples3

￢ﾀﾜThe paper was made in Bohemia,￢ﾀﾝ I said.

*** END OF THIS PROJECT GUTENBERG EBOOK THE ADVENTURES OF SHERLOCK HOLMES ***

CHAPTER I  Paragraph Examples

You must begin a new paragraph each time a different character begins to speak. Paragraphs are your friend for dialogue between two or more people. For example:
"I don't want to go home," said Julia. "I like it here at the zoo. The animals are all so funny." She began to cry and then wailed, "I didn't even get to see the elephants!"
"Your friend,

"DRACULA."

CHAPTER II  Examples2 Paragraph

I did so, and saw a large ￢ﾀﾜE￢ﾀﾝ with a small ￢ﾀﾜg,￢ﾀﾝ a ￢ﾀﾜP,￢ﾀﾝ and a large ￢ﾀﾜG￢ﾀﾝ
with a small ￢ﾀﾜt￢ﾀﾝ woven into the texture of the paper.
￢ﾀﾜWhat do you make of that?￢ﾀﾝ asked Holmes.
￢ﾀﾜThe name of the maker, no doubt; or his monogram, rather.￢ﾀﾝ

CHAPTER III  Paragraph Examples3

￢ﾀﾜThe paper was made in Bohemia,￢ﾀﾝ I said.

*** END OF THIS PROJECT GUTENBERG EBOOK THE ADVENTURES OF SHERLOCK HOLMES ***

CHAPTER I  Paragraph Examples

You must begin a new paragraph each time a different character begins to speak. Paragraphs are your friend for dialogue between two or more people. For example:
"I don't want to go home," said Julia. "I like it here at the zoo. The animals are all so funny." She began to cry and then wailed, "I didn't even get to see the elephants!"
"Your friend,

"DRACULA."

CHAPTER II  Examples2 Paragraph

I did so, and saw a large ￢ﾀﾜE￢ﾀﾝ with a small ￢ﾀﾜg,￢ﾀﾝ a ￢ﾀﾜP,￢ﾀﾝ and a large ￢ﾀﾜG￢ﾀﾝ
with a small ￢ﾀﾜt￢ﾀﾝ woven into the texture of the paper.
￢ﾀﾜWhat do you make of that?￢ﾀﾝ asked Holmes.
￢ﾀﾜThe name of the maker, no doubt; or his monogram, rather.￢ﾀﾝ

CHAPTER III  Paragraph Examples3

￢ﾀﾜThe paper was made in Bohemia,￢ﾀﾝ I said.
CONTENTS

While that may mean fun in the sun and a great reason to boost those mood-elevating vitamin D levels, it can also be a time for heartache. Grainy mustard packs a welcome punch and adds great texture to the cakes. Some of these soups can be served either hot or cold, some are filled to the brim with chunky vegetables and some are purￃﾩed glassy smooth.

Some of these soups can be served either hot or cold, some are filled to the brim with chunky vegetables and some are purￃﾩed glassy smooth.

While that may mean fun in the sun and a great reason to boost those mood-elevating vitamin D levels, it can also be a time for heartache. Grainy mustard packs a welcome punch and adds great texture to the cakes. Some of these soups can be served either hot or cold, some are filled to the brim with chunky vegetables and some are purￃﾩed glassy smooth.

Melt butter in soup kettle. Spring is all about fresh foods. This delicate, creamy watercress and pea soup is perfect for a spring day and works well served hot or chilled.

While that may mean fun in the sun and a great reason to boost those mood-elevating vitamin D levels, it can also be a time for heartache. Grainy mustard packs a welcome punch and adds great texture to the cakes. Some of these soups can be served either hot or cold, some are filled to the brim with chunky vegetables and some are purￃﾩed glassy smooth.

This delicate, creamy watercress and pea soup is perfect for a spring day and works well served hot or chilled.I could not find baby red potatoes so I used about 3/4 pound of small red potatoes cut into bite sized pieces. This delicate, creamy watercress and pea soup is perfect for a spring day and works well served hot or chilled.I could not find baby red potatoes so I used about 3/4 pound of small red potatoes cut into bite sized pieces. Melt butter in soup kettle. Spring is all about fresh foods. This delicate, creamy watercress and pea soup is perfect for a spring day and works well served hot or chilled.

While that may mean fun in the sun and a great reason to boost those mood-elevating vitamin D levels, it can also be a time for heartache. Grainy mustard packs a welcome punch and adds great texture to the cakes. Some of these soups can be served either hot or cold, some are filled to the brim with chunky vegetables and some are purￃﾩed glassy smooth.
